p: In this study, the following instruments were used: Gas Chromatography Mass Spectrometry (GC-MS) (QP-5000 GC-MS Shimadzu, Japan), ultrasonic-microwave cooperative extractor/reactor (CW-2000, China), rotary evaporator (Heidolph OB2000, VV2000, Germany), UV visible spectrophotometer (Jenway 7315, England), grinder (Moulinex model, Uno. China), balance (Radw ag, AS 220/c/2, Poland), filter paper (Machrery-Nagel, MN 617 and Whatman no.1, USA), micropipettes (Finnpipette, Finland), incubator (Nuve, Turkey), syringe filter 0.45 μm pore size (Microlab, China) and 96-well plates (Greiner bio-one, North America).
